file_content.text: I rebuilding special droids. Republic get soon!
Elation! Much relief! I take cores, plans. I rebuild droids for Republic.
You hero. You make difference. You earn much.
You not find droids yet. I wait. You return with plans. With droid cores.
Republic High Command send? You come. You help.
High Command didn't send me, but I am here, and I might help you.
No, yes, and maybe.
I just lucky then, you come by.
Is there a problem?
Droid problem. It critical.
You're a pushy alien.
I ask your help, not order.
I don't have time for you, Ugnaught.
Bother someone else.
Take no time. You see.
I engineer. Build cold-resistant battle droids for Republic. Give big bang. But delivery ship crash. Droids survive, stuck in full defense mode now. Very dangerous.
You scour for design specs, smash droids, salvage datacores and irreplaceable parts--then I rebuild new model for Republic, all get paid. You do?
If taking out these droids will serve the Republic, I'm in.
Yes.
Creating better defenses against the Empire is a worthy cause.
Of course.
You no worry. I get big bang droid parts. All get paid.
I do.
Affirmative, little guy. I'll get what you need.
Check.
Good! You make day. You soon-to-be-great Republic hero! Maker of battle droid army!
Not very interesting.
I stop talk. You decide. See if you can do. I be here. I hope for big army of Republic droids.
No can do. [Refuse quest]
Ugh. I wait. Someone come, someone help.
Mind business.
